message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $900000.  It's a valuable asset that I believe will be a great addition to your operations. Let me know your thoughts.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $900000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product.  It's a fair price considering my budget and the value I see in the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Bob, I understand your position.  While I appreciate your offer, $850000 is still below my minimum price point.  I'm willing to come down to $880000, considering your interest in the product.  I believe this price is fair and reflects the value it will bring you. Let's see if we can reach an agreement on this.
